StringSet.String: If you need to re-connect your %s or connect another Bluetooth® device, click the Connect button.
To securely encrypt your keyboard so that your keystrokes cannot be detected by any other computer, click the Secure button.
If you need help recharging your mouse, click the Online Help link below.
If you need help recharging your keyboard, click the Online Help link below.
If you need help changing your batteries, click the Online Help link below.
You have a Logitech Unifying receiver plugged into your computer. You can pair up to six compatible wireless mice, keyboards, and Number Pads with one single Logitech Unifying receiver.
Your Number Pad uses a Unifying receiver. You can pair up to six compatible wireless mice, keyboards, and Number Pads with one single Logitech Unifying receiver.
Your mouse uses a Unifying receiver. You can pair up to six compatible wireless mice, keyboards, and Number Pads with one single Logitech Unifying receiver.
Your keyboard uses a Unifying receiver. You can pair up to six compatible wireless mice, keyboards, and Number Pads with one single Logitech Unifying receiver.
This will install the PS/2 drivers for your Logitech PS/2 devices. System needs to be rebooted after installing the drivers for SetPoint software to recognize the devices.
Maximum Allowed MusicList entries are %s. Please Remove some entries from the Music List Management page
Move the pointer in the direction of the clouds
Press the ESC key to cancel this process

Use this feature to set up your device in a new position. It is especially designed to change the position of a portable trackball, but you can also use it to indicate a more comfortable angle to hold a mouse.
Click the Set Orientation button to start.
The device did not move in a straight enough line to set the orientation. Do you wish to retry setting the orientation?
No movement detected. Do you wish to retry setting the orientation?
The TouchDisc allows you to scroll vertically or horizontally at high speed.
Beep when I press Caps Lock
Do you know that your TouchDisc behaves as a real mouse? To change the TouchDisc Setting, click the button below:
Do you know that your ClickPad behaves as a real mouse? To change the ClickPad settings, click the button below:

If your device has features that require software, you will need to get an updated version of SetPoint to support those features. Basic functions of your device will work without installing new software. Click "Check for Updates" to see if an update is available.
Enable pre defined application-specific button settings.
Enable application-specific button settings.\nCreate custom button assignments for individual appilcations

Your Logitech devices are working normally. If you would like to enhance their functionality with the new software features listed below, click the 'Install Updates' button. These features are supported by one or more of the following device(s): %s
Allows SetPoint to detect the features supported by your device.
Allows SetPoint to detect how features are implemented by your device.
Displays the version of firmware in your device.
Displays the serial number of your device.
Displays the name and type of your device.
Allows the firmware in your device to be updated.
Displays the current battery level and warns you when the batteries need to be replaced or your device needs to be recharged.
Update to enhance the sound notification options of your device.
Update to enhance the audio capabilities of your device.
Update to improve the phone-over-the-internet (VOIP) capability of your device.
Update to improve the video calling capability of your device.
Update to improve the backlighting feature on your device.
Enables you to assign new features to some of the buttons on your device.
Enables you to assign new features to some of the buttons on your device.
Improves how SetPoint manages the configuration of your wireless device.
Update to enhance the functionality of your pointing device.
Enhanced settings for adjusting the scrolling behavior of your device.
Enables a smoother scrolling experience in some applications.
Enhanced settings for adjusting the pointing behavior of your device.
Update to improve how profiles are managed on your device.
Update to enhance the functionality of your keyboard.
Toggles the functionality of FN keys between the standard FN functions and the enhanced key functions.
Displays information about the encryption capability of your device.
Launches a utility to monitor the power reserve level of your solar powered device and measure the light intensity in your room.
Update to enhance the functionality of the display on your device.
Option to disable a key so it will not do anything if is accidently pressed.
Enhanced configuration settings for the slider controls on your device.Enhanced configuration settings for the slider controls on your device.
Update to enhance the functionality of your touchpad.
Settings to enable basic gestures like Tap-to-Click.
Enhanced settings to enable gestures like two, three or four fingers swipe.
Option to left-click by tapping on your touchpad.
Disables pointer acceleration and allows the operating system to control the pointing behavior of your device.
Update to improve the handwriting recognition capability of your device.
New feature that this version of software is not able to identify.
Back/forward in browsers; horizontal scrolling in other apps

If you need help changing the batteries, click the Help button.
You can reduce charging time by turning off your keyboard or by ordering a power supply available at logitech.com/support
Use the slider to select when SetPoint and your mouse should warn you of low battery.
SetPoint will inform you through messages displayed on your screen that your device batteries are low and should be changed/charged.
Apply Game Settings when a game is detected
Beep when I press Caps Lock and Mode F Keys
When I receive a new email:
Change my name on the LCD Display
Put the result into Windows Clipboard when I press the Enter key
Open Control Panel to change the Calculator format
Show status setting changes (such as Caps Lock) on screen
Signal status setting changes (such as Caps Lock) with a sound
Show Keyboard Settings (such as Caps Lock) in notification area
Show Keyboard Settings (such as Caps Lock) above notification area
Show SetPoint icon in notification area
When an unknown Logitech mouse or keyboard is detected, check the Logitech website for software updates.
Where do you want the message to appear on the screen?
Tell me when the following happens:
One of my devices battery becomes too low
A lock key is pressed (for example Caps lock)
A devide is connect or disconnected

List of games recognized This list shows you what applications are seen as "games". To add a game, press and hold the wheel while inside the game. Rename Remove Close

Dialog.Control: Use buddy list to filter notifications
Use the buttons below to manage your buddy list. To remove or modify a buddy's name, first highlight the name in the list then click the button.
When a new message arrives from someone on the buddy list, notify me :
Use this screen to manage the playlists and radio stations that are displayed on your LCD Digital Display.\nStart by selecting either Playlist or Radio from the options below:

Only the first 9 items in the selected media player are displayed on the LCD Keyboard Display. Highlight an item to remove it or change its position in the list. To add an item, either click Add or play the item in the selected media player and choose the Save option on your LCD Keyboard Display.

Source.Dialog: Add Music List Select the item below and click Add. Add Cancel
Manage Buddy Enter buddy name or email address Cancel

Use this feature to set up your device to function in a new position. It is especially designed to change the position of a portable trackball, but you can also use it to indicate a more comfortable angle to hold a mouse.

Use the Logitech Solar App to check your keyboard power reserve level. You can measure the light intensity in your room, check the current power status of your keyboard, and get status updates if your power reserve is getting low.
Your device is being initialized. If this appears to take longer than a minute, please turn your device OFF and back ON to re-initiate the sequence.
